description: This file defines the internal object 'DeliveryCodec' responsible for encoding and decoding 'StoredDeliveryOrder' objects into a custom string format, including functions for escaping and unescaping special characters. It facilitates serialization and deserialization of delivery order data.

methods.name: encode
methods.description: Serializes a StoredDeliveryOrder into a custom string format.

methods.name: decode
methods.description: Deserializes a string into a StoredDeliveryOrder object, returning null if invalid.

methods.name: decodeStageTimeline
methods.description: Parses the stage timeline string into a map of DeliveryStage to timestamp.

methods.name: escape
methods.description: Escapes special characters in a string for safe encoding.

methods.name: unescape
methods.description: Unescapes escaped characters in a string during decoding.

methods.name: splitEscaped
methods.description: Splits a string by a separator, respecting escape sequences.

methods.name: indexOfUnescaped
methods.description: Finds index of a target character in a string, ignoring escaped instances.
